snippet: A 41-year-old man was charged with aggravated murder Thursday in the slayings of four men who were found in separate homes in Bucyrus, a town of about 12,000 north of Columbus.
abstract: Donald Hoffman is charged with slaying deaths of four men found in separate homes in town of Bucyrus, Ohio; slain men had been beaten, strangled or both.
lead_paragraph: A 41-year-old man was charged with aggravated murder Thursday in the slayings of four men who were found in separate homes in Bucyrus, a town of about 12,000 north of Columbus.

headline.main: Ohio: Man Charged in 4 Murders in Small Town
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Man Charged in 4 Murders in Small Town
